content: AF-D FT SPX Flap disc Ultimate fiber-backed flat flap discs for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered specifically for your most demanding metalwork – chamfer edges or do any other aggressive material removal jobs with far less time spent replacing the abrasives Flap discs are more comfortable to grind with – due to lower vibration, longer lifespan and fewer deep marks Flat shape – smaller abrasive contact area Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing or blending welds on stainless steel, steel and other metals Chamfering edges for weld preparation on stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing burrs from rough cuts on stainless steel, steel and other metals Cleaning rust or paint on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Backing: Fiberglass Blade / disc shape: Flat - Type 27 Technical Data | Product Class | Ultimate | Backing | Fiberglass | Blade / disc shape | Flat - Type 27 | Base material | Stainless steel, Steel ### ITEMS- 2243317 - Flap disc AF-D 115 P36-40 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243311 - Flap disc AF-D 115 P60 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243361 - Flap disc AF-D 115 P80 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243270 - Flap disc AF-D 125 P36-40 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243373 - Flap disc AF-D 125 P60 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243261 - Flap disc AF-D 125 P80 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2243275 - Flap disc AF-D 180 P36-40 FT SPX - Package Size 10 pc
